_sText:
Map Stats

Build time = 6 Hours Compile time = 3 minutes

Map Description

This map is a small map with two spawnpoints. on either sides of the spawn points there are crates to give you cover. in the middle there is a drop sure enough to kill you if you were to fall and between the gap of the spawnpoints there is a small, creeky bridge enabling you to enter the enimy territory if you dare. on both sides of the spawnpoints there is a concrete shelter which is climbable via two ladders either side of the shelter. ontop of the shelters there are plenty of crates to hide behind. On Here would be an exellent sniping point. Good Luck And Have Fun.

Credits and Notes

**Note** Bots Dont Function properley on this map because when they come under combat they run off of the bridge. They Do Work but just somtimes. its just not recomended. Thank You For reading this and viewing the map. please comment and assess this map and if you happen to give me a low score (bellow 5/10) please post a valid reason. thank you
